About Us

Boarderline is a super fun winter adventure club designed to bring together the raddest and hypest people! We are a ski and snowboard club of all skill levels. In the winter season we do ski trips out west, up north, and locally. In the off-season we have hikes, formals, tailgates, socials, camping, volunteering, and more!

What We Do

During break, we take a trip out West through Outside Life. In the past, we have taken trips to Steamboat, WinterPark, Aspen, and Big Sky.

Winter Break 2024

WinterPark, Colorado

Winter Break 2025

To be announced!

During the official JMU Spring Break, we offer a trip up north. These locations include, but are not limited to, Mont Tremblant (Quebec, Canada), Killington, and JayPeak!

Spring Break 2024

JayPeak, Vermont

Spring Break 2025

To be announced!

During the winter months of December - March, we take weekend trips to Snowshoe, West Virginia (About two hours from campus!). During these trips, we stay in Cass, a small town just 20 minutes to the mountain.

Massanutten is a small resort just 20 minutes from campus. Mass is great for after-class practice or to just get out and ride with your friends. While we as a club do not do official trips to Massanutten, people in the club will drive up and offer rides. As a member in the club, you will be offered a season pass to Massanutten at a discounted rate.

Real Words About Boarderline Ski and Snowboard Club

"Boarderline is like really cool"

Someone at some point in time

Formals

As a club, we host formals, and semi-formals. We typically have one formal a year and two to three semi-formals a year! These are always a great time to dress up with your friends and bring a special plus one!

Tailgates

During Football season, we support other JMU athletes by hosting the best tailgates and attending the games as a club! We start our gameday when tailgate opens and end when JMU wins!

Intramurals

In the Fall and Spring Semesters, we participate in several intramural teams. These teams include, but are not limited to, flag football, kickball, volleyball, dodgeball, and more!

Health and Wellness

Mental Health and community are super important to us as a club. That is why we host several health and wellness events a semester to deepen personal connections and promote mental health!
